title: Livery Delivers a Seamless Low Latency Streaming Experience with Help from Akamai
description: Our new normal has ushered in the advent of hybrid events ? a mix of in-person and virtual events. This has made seamless live streaming with active participation of the audience, both live and remote, more important than ever. Amsterdam-headquartered company Livery is an end-to-end SaaS solution running on the Akamai content distribution network (CDN), which is perfectly suited for interactive sports, interactive learning, and live commerce productions. We?re delighted that they have chosen to work with us to deliver the experience their clients have come to love.
author: Ina Christova
